text: Gotcha, thanks for confirming Jon. At the moment there is no other way but we're planning an inline conversion which would simply "upgrade" the classic email to a drag and drop which would solve this need. It's not going to be available immediately but something that we should be able to work on in the coming months.
Hi Dana, if you open up the "+Add" sidebar within an email template you can see all the built in modules:
From there you can click the pencil icon on any of them to open it, and from there you can clone it :+1:
Do you have a size range in mind? Or does it change from email to email?
itâ€™ll probably change from client to client
